black.content: I'll now try a manual override on _.

Good news! It was NOT _!
And when you're _ I will be still alive.
GlaDOS has a new _ core.
And then science gets done, and you make a neat gun, for _.
Oh, hi. So, how are you holding up? Because I'm  _.
They said if I ever used my _, I would DIE.
Aperture started out as a shower curtain factory, but later they specialized in _.
Jump in the pit! There's _ at the bottom! And _! And _ will be waiting for you there!

white: Cave Johnson shoving 500 pencils up his butt because Caroline said he couldn't.
Using a portal gun to give yourself head.
Defective turrets giving you a heartattack.
A companion cube with human bodies in it.
A very minor case of serious brain damage.
Looking in the operational end of the device.
That one really fat turret from the turret opera.
The part where he kills you.
Jumping when you want to say "apple".
Being cast into the bowels of the earth and pecked by birds.
Doing what you must because you can.
The people who are still alive.
Fanfics that are about robots having sex somehow.
Being turned into a potato after being in charge of aperture science for hundreds of years.
